title: About
subtitle: BLE Scanner - Professional Bluetooth Low Energy Device Manager

projectInfo.title: Project Information
projectInfo.name: Project Name
projectInfo.descriptionText: A professional BLE (Bluetooth Low Energy) device scanner built with Tauri, React, and SimpleBLE. Provides comprehensive device discovery, connection management, and real-time data monitoring capabilities.
projectInfo.feature1: Real-time BLE device scanning and discovery

acknowledgments.title: Acknowledgments
acknowledgments.text: Special thanks to the open source community and all the amazing libraries and tools that made this project possible. This application is built with modern web technologies and cross-platform frameworks to provide a seamless Bluetooth Low Energy management experience across different operating systems.

simpleBleDescription: The core BLE functionality of this project is powered by the SimpleBLE library developed by the OpenBluetoothToolbox team. SimpleBLE is a cross-platform Bluetooth Low Energy communication library that provides a unified API interface for Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android.
